definition: A geographical feature consisting of a large area of land that is elevated and characterized by numerous mountains, hills, and peaks. It is commonly used to refer to a specific type of landform found in various regions around the world.

examples.english: The mountain range is very high.

examples.german: Wir wandern gerne in den Gebirgen.
examples.english: We enjoy hiking in the mountains.

examples.german: Das Gebirge erstreckt sich über mehrere Länder.
examples.english: The mountain range extends across several countries.

examples.german: Im Gebirge gibt es viele schöne Wanderwege.
examples.english: There are many beautiful hiking trails in the mountains.

examples.german: Das Gebirge ist von einer dichten Waldlandschaft umgeben.
examples.english: The mountain range is surrounded by dense forest landscape.
